mapper.sql:
ORDER BY PRJ_ID DESC
ORDER BY
PRJ_ID
PRJ_NAME
(SELECT SORTCD.CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL SORTCD WHERE SORTCD.CD_NO = '207' AND SORTCD.CD_DTL_NO = DISTRIBUTION_TYPE)
CVSS_SCORE
(SELECT SORTCD.CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL SORTCD WHERE SORTCD.CD_NO = '200' AND SORTCD.CD_DTL_NO = DIVISION)
CREATOR
PRJ_VERSION
CREATED_DATE
CASE WHEN OS_TYPE = '999' THEN OS_TYPE_ETC ELSE (SELECT SORTCD.CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL SORTCD WHERE SORTCD.CD_NO = '213' AND SORTCD.CD_DTL_NO = OS_TYPE) END
ASC
DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{countPerPage}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PRE_PROJECT_MASTER WHERE CREATOR = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(CREATED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* SelfCheckMapper.selectProjectCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT T1.PRJ_ID , T1.PRJ_NAME , T1.PRJ_VERSION , T1.DISTRIBUTION_TYPE , T1.COMMENT , T1.OS_TYPE , T1.OS_TYPE_ETC , IFNULL(T1.SRC_CSV_FILE_ID, '') SRC_CSV_FILE_ID , T1.DIVISION , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS WHERE T1.CREATOR = USER_ID), T1.CREATOR) AS CREATOR , T1.CREATED_DATE , IFNULL((SELECT USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS WHERE T1.MODIFIER = USER_ID), T1.MODIFIER) AS MODIFIER , T1.MODIFIED_DATE , IFNULL(T1.CVSS_SCORE, 0) AS CVSS_SCORE , T1.CVE_ID FROM PRE_PROJECT_MASTER T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A1.REFERENCE_ID , MAX(A2.CVSS_SCORE) AS CVSS_SCORE , 'Y' AS VULN_YN FROM PRE_OSS_COMPONENTS A1 INNER JOIN OSS_MASTER A2 ON A1.OSS_NAME = A2.OSS_NAME AND A1.OSS_VERSION = A2.OSS_VERSION AND A2.VULN_YN = 'Y' WHERE A1.REFERENCE_DIV IN ('10','11','12','14','15') AND A1.EXCLUDE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY REFERENCE_ID) T2 ON T1.PRJ_ID = T2.REFERENCE_ID WHERE T1.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND (T1.CREATOR = #{userId} OR EXISTS (SELECT A1.PRJ_ID, A1.DIVISION FROM PRE_PROJECT_WATCHER A1
WHERE A1.PRJ_ID = T1.PRJ_ID AND (A1.USER_ID = #{userId} OR (A1.USER_ID = 'all' AND A1.DIVISION = (SELECT DIVISION FROM T2_USERS A2 WHERE A2.USER_ID = #{userId}) ))))
AND T1.PRJ_ID = #{prjId} ) A WHERE 1=1

/* apiSelfCheckMapper.selectProjectMaster */ SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.PRJ_NAME , A.PRJ_VERSION , A.DISTRIBUTION_TYPE , CASE WHEN B.CONTENTS IS NULL THEN A.COMMENT ELSE B.CONTENTS END AS COMMENT , B.COMM_ID AS COMMENT_IDX , A.OS_TYPE , A.OS_TYPE_ETC , A.USE_YN
/** FILE_ID **/ , A.SRC_CSV_FILE_ID , A.CREATOR , A.CREATED_DATE , A.MODIFIER , A.MODIFIED_DATE , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.CREATOR) AS PRJ_USER_NAME , (SELECT CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND CD_DTL_NO = A.DIVISION) AS PRJ_DIVISION_NAME FROM PRE_PROJECT_MASTER A LEFT JOIN COMMENTS_HISTORY B ON A.COMMENT = B.COMM_ID WHERE A.PRJ_ID = #{prjId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PRE_PROJECT_WATCHER WAT LEFT JOIN T2_USERS USR ON WAT.USER_ID = USR.USER_ID AND USR.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE WAT.PRJ_ID = #{prjId} AND (WAT.EMAIL = #{email} OR USR.EMAIL = #{email})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRE_PROJECT_WATCHER (PRJ_ID, DIVISION, USER_ID, EMAIL) VALUES (#{prjId}, #{division}, #{userId}, #{email})
mapper.sql:
(SELECT T1.PRJ_ID, T1.PRJ_NAME, T1.PRJ_VERSION, T1.DISTRIBUTION_TYPE, T1.COMMENT, IFNULL(T1.CVSS_SCORE, 0) AS CVSS_SCORE, T1.CVE_ID, IFNULL(T1.SRC_CSV_FILE_ID, '') SRC_CSV_FILE_ID, IFNULL((SELECT USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS WHERE T1.CREATOR = USER_ID), T1.CREATOR) AS CREATOR, T1.CREATED_DATE, IFNULL((SELECT USER_NAME FROM T2_USERS WHERE T1.MODIFIER = USER_ID), T1.MODIFIER) AS MODIFIER, T1.MODIFIED_DATE, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PRE_OSS_COMPONENTS SUB WHERE T1.PRJ_ID = SUB.REFERENCE_ID AND SUB.REFERENCE_DIV = '10' ) AS OSS_COUNT -- T1.PACKAGE_FILE_ID, -- T1.PACKAGE_FILE_ID2, -- T1.PACKAGE_FILE_ID3, -- T1.NOTICE_FILE_ID, -- T1.REVIEW_REPORT_FILE_ID
FROM PRE_PROJECT_MASTER T1
WHERE T1.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.PRJ_ID = #{projectId}
AND T1.PRJ_NAME = #{projectName}
AND T1.PRJ_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{projectName},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{createdFrom},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{createdTo},'%Y%m%d')
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM PRE_OSS_COMPONENTS X LEFT OUTER JOIN PRE_OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE Y ON CONCAT(X.REFERENCE_ID, '-', X.REFERENCE_DIV, '-', X.COMPONENT_IDX) = Y.COMPONENT_ID WHERE T1.PRJ_ID = X.REFERENCE_ID
AND X.OSS_NAME = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{ossName}, '_', '\\\\_')
AND X.OSS_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{ossName}, '_', '\\\\_'),'%')
AND Y.LICENSE_NAME = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{licenseName}, '_', '\\\\_')
AND Y.LICENSE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{licenseName}, '_', '\\\\_'),'%')
)
) A
